title: Palantir, Shiba Inu, Apple, American Airlines: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Palantir stock jumped on a U.S. Army contract; Airlines are slipping as fuel costs surge
body:
Futures are pointing to a fresh selloff on Wall Street, as bond yields extend rises and energy prices soar. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of Wednesday’s open.
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
